title: Zebra DelGuard Mechanical Pencil with Bonus Lead Refill, Fine Point, 0.5mm Point Size, Standard #2 HB Lead, Black Barrel, 1-Count
feature: 0.5mm fine point, standard lead point size, 12 piece tube of unbreakable lead bonus refill for precise and enjoyable writing
Double spring, patent-pending mechanism ensures lead is secure and protected from breakage every time you click to advance your lead
Patented technology eliminates lead breakage regardless of writing styles and angles; Click twice for best results!
Features a lightweight, black barrel with a textured grip for enhanced comfort, and provides a precise and enjoyable writing experience
Recommended refills are Zebra's DelGuard Unbreakable Lead Refill (89881) and Zebra's DelGuard Eraser Refill (83225)
description: Whether student or professional, Zebra offers a wide selection of mechanical pencils, each thoughtfully designed to meet your needs. If you're looking for balance and consistency of lines, the DelGuard mechanical pencil will not disappoint. DelGuard's double spring, patent-pending mechanism ensures lead is secure and protected from breakage every time you click to advance your lead; for best results we recommend clicking twice! Our patented technology eliminates lead breakage regardless of writing styles and angles, resulting in an enjoyable writing experience uninterrupted by broken lead. The DelGuard Mechanical Pencil features a lightweight, black barrel with a textured grip for enhanced comfort. Provides a precise and enjoyable writing experience. Try it, we dare you! The recommended refills for this mechanical pen are Zebra's DelGuard Unbreakable Lead Refill (89881) and Zebra's DelGuard Eraser Refill (83225).
